btkReorientImageToStandard.cxx

00036 #if defined(_MSC_VER)
00037 #pragma warning ( disable : 4786 )
00038 #endif
00039 
00040 #include "itkImage.h"
00041 #include "itkImageRegionIteratorWithIndex.h"
00042 #include "itkContinuousIndex.h"
00043 
00044 #include "itkImageFileReader.h"
00045 #include "itkImageFileWriter.h"
00046 
00047 #include <tclap/CmdLine.h>
00048 #include "vnl/vnl_cross.h"
00049 
00050 #include "itkEuler3DTransform.h"
00051 #include "itkResampleImageFilter.h"
00052 #include "itkNearestNeighborInterpolateImageFunction.h"
00053 #include "itkOrientImageFilter.h"
00054 
00055 #include "vnl/vnl_inverse.h"
00056 
00057 // Local includes
00058 #include "btkLandmarksFileReader.h"
00059 
00060 
00061 int main( int argc, char *argv[] )
00062 {
00063 
00064   try {
00065 
00066   // Parse arguments
00067 
00068   TCLAP::CmdLine cmd("Reorient an image to standard orientation", ' ', "Unversioned");
00069 
00070   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> inputArg("i","input","Input image",true,"","string",cmd);
00071   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> outputArg("o","output","Reoriented image",true,"","string",cmd);
00072   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> lmksArg("l","landmarks","Landmarks file",true,"","string",cmd);
00073   TCLAP::SwitchArg nnSwitch("","nn","Nearest Neighbor interpolation", cmd, false);
00074   TCLAP::SwitchArg fovSwitch("e","extend-fov","Extends the FOV to avoid image cropping", cmd, false);
00075 
00076   cmd.parse( argc, argv );
00077 
00078   const char *inputImageFile  = inputArg.getValue().c_str();
00079   const char *outputImageFile = outputArg.getValue().c_str();
00080   const char *lmksFile   = lmksArg.getValue().c_str();
00081 
00082   bool nn         = nnSwitch.getValue();
00083 
00084   const    unsigned int    Dimension = 3;
00085 
00086   // Read image
00087 
00088   typedef itk::Image< short, Dimension >  ImageType;
00089   typedef itk::ImageFileReader< ImageType > ImageReaderType;
00090   ImageReaderType::Pointer  imageReader  = ImageReaderType::New();
00091   imageReader -> SetFileName(  inputImageFile );
00092   imageReader -> Update();
00093   ImageType::Pointer image = imageReader->GetOutput();
00094 
00095   // Read landmarks
00096 
00097   btk::btkLandmarksFileReader::Pointer landRead = btk::btkLandmarksFileReader::New();
00098   landRead->SetInputFileName(lmksFile);
00099   landRead->Update();
00100 
00101   double *lpt_ras = landRead->GetOutputLPT();
00102   double *rpt_ras = landRead->GetOutputRPT();
00103   double *apt_ras = landRead->GetOutputAPT();
00104   double *ppt_ras = landRead->GetOutputPPT();
00105 
00106   // Convert points to lps coordinates
00107 
00108   ImageType::PointType leftPoint, rightPoint, anteriorPoint, posteriorPoint;
00109 
00110   leftPoint[0]      = -lpt_ras[0]; leftPoint[1]      = -lpt_ras[1]; leftPoint[2]      = lpt_ras[2];
00111   rightPoint[0]     = -rpt_ras[0]; rightPoint[1]     = -rpt_ras[1]; rightPoint[2]     = rpt_ras[2];
00112   anteriorPoint[0]  = -apt_ras[0]; anteriorPoint[1]  = -apt_ras[1]; anteriorPoint[2]  = apt_ras[2];
00113   posteriorPoint[0] = -ppt_ras[0]; posteriorPoint[1] = -ppt_ras[1]; posteriorPoint[2] = ppt_ras[2];
00114 
00115   // Recover original direction matrix
00116 
00117   vnl_matrix<double> oriDirection(3,3);
00118   oriDirection = image -> GetDirection().GetVnlMatrix();
00119 
00120   // Reorient mean gradient to RAI
00121 
00122   typedef itk::OrientImageFilter< ImageType, ImageType >  FilterType;
00123 
00124   // Reorient sequence to RAI
00125 
00126   FilterType::Pointer filter = FilterType::New();
00127   filter -> SetInput( image  );
00128   filter -> UseImageDirectionOn();
00129   filter -> SetDesiredCoordinateOrientation( itk::SpatialOrientation::ITK_COORDINATE_ORIENTATION_RAI );
00130   filter -> Update();
00131 
00132   ImageType::Pointer image_reo = filter -> GetOutput();
00133 
00134   vnl_matrix<double> reoDirection(3,3);
00135   reoDirection = image_reo -> GetDirection().GetVnlMatrix();
00136 
00137   vnl_matrix<double> reoDirectionTrans(3,3);
00138   reoDirectionTrans = reoDirection.transpose();
00139 
00140   // Create the image in standard orientation
00141   // p = I*S*idx + O_center
00142 
00143   ImageType::Pointer stdImage = image_reo;
00144 
00145   ImageType::DirectionType stdImageDirection  = stdImage -> GetDirection();
00146   stdImageDirection.SetIdentity();
00147   stdImage -> SetDirection (stdImageDirection);
00148 
00149   ImageType::SpacingType stdSpacing  = stdImage -> GetSpacing();
00150   ImageType::SizeType    stdSize     = stdImage -> GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize();
00151   ImageType::IndexType   stdIndex    = stdImage -> GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetIndex();
00152 
00153   ImageType::PointType stdOrigin;
00154 
00155   for (unsigned int i=0; i<3; i++)
00156     stdOrigin[i] = (1.0-stdSize[i])*0.5*stdSpacing[i];
00157 
00158   stdImage -> SetOrigin( stdOrigin );
00159 
00160   // Obtain directions LPS directions in standard image
00161 
00162   vnl_vector<double> left_lps(3), pos_lps(3), sup_lps(3);
00163 
00164   left_lps = reoDirectionTrans*( leftPoint.GetVnlVector() - rightPoint.GetVnlVector() );
00165   left_lps.normalize();
00166 
00167   pos_lps = reoDirectionTrans*( posteriorPoint.GetVnlVector() - anteriorPoint.GetVnlVector() );
00168   pos_lps.normalize();
00169 
00170   sup_lps = vnl_cross_3d(left_lps,pos_lps);
00171 
00172   // TODO The following code is quite repeated throug the library
00173   // we should include it somewhere else
00174 
00175   vnl_matrix<double> R(3,3);
00176   R.set_identity();
00177 
00178   R(0,0) = left_lps(0); R(0,1) = left_lps(1); R(0,2) = left_lps(2);
00179   R(1,0) = pos_lps(0) ; R(1,1) = pos_lps(1);  R(1,2) = pos_lps(2);
00180   R(2,0) = sup_lps(0) ; R(2,1) = sup_lps(1);  R(2,2) = sup_lps(2);
00181 
00182   // Corrects rotation matrix
00183 
00184   vnl_matrix<double> PQ = R;
00185   vnl_matrix<double> NQ = R;
00186   vnl_matrix<double> PQNQDiff;
00187 
00188   const unsigned int maximumIterations = 100;
00189 
00190   for(unsigned int ni = 0; ni < maximumIterations; ni++ )
00191   {
00192     // Average current Qi with its inverse transpose
00193     NQ = ( PQ + vnl_inverse_transpose( PQ ) ) / 2.0;
00194     PQNQDiff = NQ - PQ;
00195     if( PQNQDiff.frobenius_norm() < 1e-7 )
00196     {
00197 //      std::cout << "Polar decomposition used " << ni << " iterations " << std::endl;
00198       break;
00199     }
00200     else
00201     {
00202       PQ = NQ;
00203     }
00204   }
00205 
00206   typedef itk::Euler3DTransform<double> TransformType;
00207   TransformType::Pointer transform = TransformType::New();
00208 
00209   typedef itk::ContinuousIndex< double, 3 > ContinuousIndexType;
00210   ContinuousIndexType centerIndex;
00211 
00212   centerIndex[0] = (stdSize[0] - 1.0) / 2.0;
00213   centerIndex[1] = (stdSize[1] - 1.0) / 2.0;
00214   centerIndex[2] = (stdSize[2] - 1.0) / 2.0;
00215 
00216   ImageType::PointType centerPoint;
00217 
00218   stdImage -> TransformContinuousIndexToPhysicalPoint(centerIndex, centerPoint);
00219 
00220   transform -> SetCenter( centerPoint );
00221   transform -> SetRotationMatrix( NQ );
00222 
00223 //  TODO Cannot constrain the rotation because sometimes it is necessary to rotate in xy
00224 //  Something I could do is to round the rotations in xy to n*pi*/2 ...
00225 //  transform -> SetRotation( 0.0, 0.0, transform -> GetAngleZ() );
00226 
00227   // Extend FOV according to the transformation
00228 
00229   ImageType::SizeType  resamplingSize;
00230   ImageType::IndexType lowerIndex; lowerIndex.Fill(0);
00231   ImageType::IndexType upperIndex; upperIndex.Fill(0);
00232 
00233   if ( fovSwitch.isSet() )
00234   {
00235     typedef itk::ImageRegionIteratorWithIndex< ImageType > ImageIteratorType;
00236     ImageIteratorType stdImageIt( stdImage, stdImage -> GetLargestPossibleRegion() );
00237 
00238     ImageType::IndexType index;
00239     ImageType::IndexType transformedIndex;
00240 
00241     ImageType::PointType point;
00242     ImageType::PointType transformedPoint;
00243 
00244     // Even when only the corners are necessary, the code is shorter in this way
00245     // (and it's not very expensive to compute it)
00246 
00247     for(stdImageIt.GoToBegin(); !stdImageIt.IsAtEnd(); ++stdImageIt)
00248     {
00249       index = stdImageIt.GetIndex();
00250       stdImage -> TransformIndexToPhysicalPoint(index, point);
00251       transformedPoint = transform -> TransformPoint(point);
00252       stdImage -> TransformPhysicalPointToIndex(transformedPoint, transformedIndex);
00253 
00254       for (unsigned int i = 0; i<3; i++)
00255         if ( transformedIndex[i] < lowerIndex[i] ) lowerIndex[i] = transformedIndex[i];
00256         else if
00257            ( transformedIndex[i] > upperIndex[i] ) upperIndex[i] = transformedIndex[i];
00258 
00259     }
00260 
00261     resamplingSize[0] = upperIndex[0] - lowerIndex[0] + 1;
00262     resamplingSize[1] = upperIndex[1] - lowerIndex[1] + 1;
00263     resamplingSize[2] = upperIndex[2] - lowerIndex[2] + 1;
00264 
00265   } else
00266   {
00267     resamplingSize = stdImage -> GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize();
00268   }
00269 
00270   ImageType::PointType resamplingOrigin;
00271   stdImage -> TransformIndexToPhysicalPoint(lowerIndex, resamplingOrigin );
00272 
00273   transform -> SetRotationMatrix( NQ.transpose() );
00274 
00275   // Resampling
00276 
00277   typedef itk::ResampleImageFilter< ImageType, ImageType >  ResamplerType;
00278   ResamplerType::Pointer resampler = ResamplerType::New();
00279 
00280   typedef itk::NearestNeighborInterpolateImageFunction< ImageType >  InterpolatorType;
00281   InterpolatorType::Pointer interpolator = InterpolatorType::New();
00282   if (nn) resampler -> SetInterpolator(interpolator);
00283 
00284   resampler -> SetInput( stdImage );
00285   resampler -> SetTransform(transform);
00286   resampler -> SetDefaultPixelValue(0);
00287   resampler -> SetSize( resamplingSize );
00288   resampler -> SetOutputOrigin( resamplingOrigin );
00289   resampler -> SetOutputDirection( stdImage -> GetDirection()  );
00290   resampler -> SetOutputSpacing( stdImage -> GetSpacing() );
00291 
00292   resampler -> Update();
00293 
00294   typedef itk::ImageFileWriter< ImageType > ImageWriterType;
00295   ImageWriterType::Pointer  imageWriter  = ImageWriterType::New();
00296   imageWriter -> SetInput( resampler -> GetOutput() );
00297   imageWriter -> SetFileName(  outputImageFile );
00298   imageWriter -> Update();
00299 
00300   } catch (TCLAP::ArgException &e)  // catch any exceptions
00301   { std::cerr << "error: " << e.error() << " for arg " << e.argId() << std::endl; }
00302 
00303   return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00304 }
